entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 20 km/h except southeast 30 near Bowen Island this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
